addAuthorization(address).details: Method will revert if the account is already authorized

returns._authorized: Whether the account is authorized or not

params._veloLpOracle: The address of the pessimistic velo lp oracle
params._veloPool: The address of the velo pool underlying the yearn vault
params._yearnVault: The address of the yearn vault contract

returns._yearnVeloVaultRelayer: Address of the deployed YearnVeloVaultRelayer contract

removeAuthorization(address).details: Method will revert if the account is not authorized

authorizedAccounts(address).notice: Checks whether an account is authorized on the contract

yearnVeloVaultRelayersList().notice: Getter for the list of YearnVeloVaultRelayer contracts
